entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE UPPER 30S THIS AFTERNOON
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
COOLER WITH LOWS IN THE MID 20S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS AROUND 40
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH, BECOMING SOUTH IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
TEMPERATURE FALLING TO AROUND 40 IN THE AFTERNOON
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S
LOWS 10 TO 15

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
